channel.title: Our Recent Works on CanopYBlacK
channel.description: Recent content in Our Recent Works on CanopYBlacK

item.title: The Slave Genesis
item.description: The documentary ‘The Slave Genesis’ deals with the social transformation of Paniya tribals, who belong to South India’s hill district of Wayanad. ‘Paniya’ literally translates to ‘worker’.

item.title: Vithappadu - Sowing Field
item.description: vithappadu’ (Sowing Field) provides an insight to the issues of food sovereignty, sustainable management of traditional rice farming system and the adaptive strategy of reorganization of the social structure of traditional agricultural system.

item.title: Frogs in Wayanad
item.description: Frogs in Wayanad is a process documentation of ecological measurement, shows paddy wetlands to be multifunctional ecosystems which in addition to producing food.
